author: fthyssen
body:
This PR adds an RPC TwinMux unpacker and packer.

This includes a standalone RPC TwinMux Packer.  The components can be picked up by the L1T TwinMux if they decide to implement one.  The L1T TwinMux unpacker ignores the RPC words and didn't generate errors when running on the packed data.

I profit of this PR to also add a PopConAnalyser to fill the RPC CPPF and OMTF LinkMap conditions.

RPCAMCLinkCounters is a new DataFormat along the lines of RPCRawDataCounts, to be produced for DQM purposes, but not stored.

Description: https://indico.cern.ch/event/624577/contributions/2521438/
title: add the RPC TwinMux Unpacker and Packer
